description: This file defines a React functional component named GameModeSelector, which provides a user interface to select between multiplayer mode and playing against an AI with a chosen symbol (X or O). It handles user interactions such as button clicks and maintains local state for the AI's symbol choice.

methods.name: GameModeSelector
methods.description: React functional component for selecting game mode and AI symbol.
methods.parameters: props: { onModeSelect: (mode: Mode, symbol?: Player) => void }
